role_description: An Ansible role that installs Cockpit on Linux systems
role_description_full_overview: [Cockpit](https://cockpit-project.org/) allows you to view many aspects of system performance and make configuration changes, though the task list may depend on the particular flavor of Linux that you are using.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs Cockpit on Linux systems.
